long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. After pasting the text, it will automatically parse into JSON

2. If there is an error in JSON parsing, it will automatically locate the wrong line and can be modified at the location of the location

3. After successful parsing, you can search for the specified character and search for the previous or next result

4. The path and line number of the search results are displayed below

5. Click on the content to display his path and value

6. You can copy content from online or local tables, paste it here, and generate JSON

7. You can export JSON data to an Excel spreadsheet
